title: Ion AmpliSeq Library Prep 1/4: DNA Target Amplification
author: Opentrons
description:
Links:
 Part 1: DNA Target Amplification
 Part 2: Partially Digest Amplicons
 Part 3: Ligate Adapters
 Part 4: Library Purification

You will need:
 P10 Single-channel Pipette
 P10 Multi-channel Pipette
 Aluminum Block Set
 4-in-1 Tube Rack Set
 Twin.tec skirted PCR Plates
 PCR Strips
 1.5 or 2 mL Eppendorf Tubes
 Neptune 10 uL Filter Tips
process:
Input the number of samples you are processing. (MAX=24)
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer 4 uL Hifi Mix to the 96-well PCR plate.
Robot will transfer 14 uL Precision ID Panel to the 96-well PCR plate.
Robot will transfer samples from the 2 mL tube rack to PCR plate.
notes:
Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate (Reagent Plate in slot 1):
 Hifi Mix: column 1
 Precision ID Panel: column 2

4-in-1 2-mL Tube Rack (Sample Rack):
* Sample order: A1, B1, C1, D1, A2, B2...

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

You will need:
* [P10 Single-channel Pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/single-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5978967113757)
* [P10 Multi-channel Pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/8-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5978988707869)
* [Aluminum Block Set](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/aluminum-block-set)

* PCR Strips
* 1.5 or 2 mL Eppendorf Tubes
* Neptune 10 uL Filter Tips
markdown.process:
1. Input the number of samples you are processing. (MAX=24)
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. Robot will transfer 4 uL Hifi Mix to the 96-well PCR plate.
8. Robot will transfer 14 uL Precision ID Panel to the 96-well PCR plate.
9. Robot will transfer samples from the 2 mL tube rack to PCR plate.
markdown.notes:
Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate (Reagent Plate in slot 1):
* Hifi Mix: column 1
* Precision ID Panel: column 2

---

4-in-1 2-mL Tube Rack (Sample Rack):
* Sample order: A1, B1, C1, D1, A2, B2...
